meanings.definition: A collection of concise but detailed information on a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: The compendia on dinosaurs helped me learn a lot about these ancient creatures.
meanings.sent2: I found a compendia of recipes for quick and easy meals.
meanings.sent3: The compendia of jokes made everyone at the party laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a compendia of memories, each one carefully stored and easily accessible.
meanings.sent5: The compendia of constellations in the night sky was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A summary or abstract of a larger work.
meanings.sent1: The compendia of the novel helped me understand the main plot points.
meanings.sent2: I wrote a compendia of the research paper to share with my classmates.
meanings.sent3: The compendia of the movie was so short, it left out all the good parts!
meanings.sent4: His speech was a compendia of the key points, making it easy to follow.
meanings.sent5: The compendia of the play captured the essence of the story beautifully.

meanings.definition: A compilation or anthology of various works or writings.
meanings.sent1: The compendia of poems by different authors was a joy to read.
meanings.sent2: She created a compendia of short stories from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The compendia of songs from the 80s brought back so many memories.
meanings.sent4: The library was a compendia of knowledge, with books on every topic imaginable.
meanings.sent5: His room was a compendia of art, with paintings and sculptures adorning every wall.
